title: Enchanted Moondial
summaries: The Enchanted Moondial is a furniture item that can be placed. Pressing the ⚷ Open / Activate button on it will advance time to dusk (7:30 PM) the current or following day. It has a 7-day cooldown period, so once used, it will not be usable again until 7 in-game days (2 hours and 48 minutes in real time) have passed normally. The Enchanted Moondial is obtained by throwing an Enchanted Sundial into Shimmer.
The Enchanted Moondial does not turn the time to dusk immediately. It instead "fast-forwards" time, causing it to pass more quickly than usual.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows time to fast forward to dusk one day per week
